programme.desc: When all the Westley Kids but Philly Phil get invited to a popular kid's party Philly Phil becomes determined to figure out exactly what it is about popular kid behavior that he doesn't grasp. The data he compiles on the subject he then uses to build a robot he calls BROC (Big Robot on Campus) which he endows with all the sure-fire popularity attributes he can think of thus making it possible for Philly Phil to ride into popularity on BROC's coattails. Surprisingly Philly Phil's plan seems to work... that is until things start backfiring when BROC begins treating Philly Phil as a social liability and starts scoring popularity points at Philly Phil's expense.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Mom is sick on a busy day at home, Tag offers to pick up the slack and take on her tasks for the day. Tag handles it at first, but when the responsibilities start to stack up, she realizes that being Mom is much harder than she thought. \ Tag and Scooch are excited to get to know Kit, who has organized a bunch of cat-ivities for the day. But when Kit realizes she accidentally scratched up Frank and Beans’s tree, she, Tag and Scooch find a way to make it up to them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dews' Glitter Guide, Willow comes to check on the Dews’ progress, they feel like they’re failing to impress her, until Lola gets locked out of the apartment during a game of Hide-and-Seek and Dews work together to get her back inside. / When the Dew Drops discover a time capsule in the park, they set out to find the mystery owner.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! / The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but can’t find the time to practice.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control"… or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The riders realize the Flyers are using the Deathsong to capture Singetails and plan a rescue mission to liberate them

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The kids hatch a plan to take down Cleve and rescue Ms. Nowhere and Gary. Meanwhile, despite interference from Ziri, Cleve successfully begins to launch his satellites into space, which will allow him to use his weather machine to destroy Earth’s major cities and transform the Sahara into the only oasis. In order to stop the satellites, the team engages in an all-out battle against Cleve, Matsuo, and Rafaela. Just when it looks like our guys have the upperhand, Cleve shows them he has one last trick up his sleeve – a mech suit!

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Cleve has the team surrounded – is this the end? Suddenly, Cisco bursts in to save the day, along with all of the friends the team has made along the way in the Sahara. Working together, they manage to stop Cleve’s missiles and defeat Rafaela and Matsuo. But before they get a chance to celebrate, a giant fire tornado tears its way through the Sahara destroying everything in its path. Tony decides to make one last daring attempt in order to save the day.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: After an epic chase around the globe, the team finally catches Rafaela, making it Ms. Nowhere's 100th arrest - and the agency is throwing her a party! Meanwhile, Cisco's uncle Tuco, a famous luchador in Mexico, is visiting town promoting his next show. But the celebration comes to a halt when there's an explosion at the party and an attack by a mysterious group of criminals!

programme.title: My Life Me

programme.title: My Life Me

programme.title: My Life Me

programme.desc: Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: All the tots are excited as Aunt Tulip is holding a Caribbean themed carnival. But will the weather hold long enough for them to have their celebrations?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It is a windy day in the garden, Fifi's washing has blown away. Poppy offers to find it, but she gets caught in the storm. The other tots set out to find her and spend a wild night out in the open.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia is assigned to do a school project based on one of the planets in the solar system, but they're all so interesting, she just can't decide which one! With a little help from her brother Ian, she finds a solution: create a model of the entire solar system, and maybe even discover a brand new planet in the process

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: When Grandma takes Olivia and Ian to a special beach, they're all shocked to find that Grandma's old friend Annette has built a huge fence blocking the best part of the beach. They don't let that stop them from having a good time. Soon with Olivia's prompting, even Annette wants to join in on the fun.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged
programme.desc: Waldos new fancy gadget gets noticed by a truck who is obsessed with gold and only in it for himself

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: From the Rockies to the Pacific, British Columbia is a jewel of biodiversity! Roam vast landscapes where the mighty grizzly bear reigns supreme. It’s a majestic, wild world waiting to be preserved!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Life finds a way! Blown by winds and washed ashore, the Caribbean is now a mesmerizing hotspot of global biodiversity. Explore these fragile, emerald ecosystems and their incredible island resilience.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, Little penguin Snapper returns to the colony but will he be accepted? The vet team prepare to treat Samantran tiger Sali, and the Zoo helps to save an endangered native species at risk.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, the Ungulate team prepare for a birth, we meet one of the longest living animals and Auckland Zoo helps to save an endangered giant.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Baby Giraffe meets the herd, the Zoo’s five otter brothers are on the move and the ectotherm team search for a hidden for a treasure.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, it's an anxious time for Zoo vets as they work to save one of the most endangered birds on the planet, and the ectotherm team are on a mission in the wild South Island.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Mena visits a city steeped in tradition... and gravy, as he indulges in hearty planted-based Quebecois classics—poutine, smoked “meat” sandwiches, tourtiere, and the famous Montreal bagel.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Mena feasts with magician and Vegas legend Penn Jillette. He explores the off-strip Sin City vegan food scene, indulging in plant-based “Beef” Wellington, sky-high waffles, and intricate dim sum, then dines with cookbook author Carleigh Bodrug.

programme.title: Matthew Perry: Not Just Friends
programme.desc: Matthew Perry, beloved for his role as Chandler Bing, is remembered through archive footage highlighting his comedic legacy and personal struggles, both on and off set, as a cherished friend and human being.

programme.title: Robin Williams: Laugh Until You Cry
programme.desc: The comic genius with an electric mind, with a range of talent that left us breathless. His story inspires us to look past the mask of those people who seem to have a perfect life. His legacy lives on.

programme.title: John Cena: Champion Of The Ring
programme.desc: John Cena dominated wrestling for over a decade before transitioning to Hollywood, following Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson. Whether acting or wrestling, he lives by his mantra: Hustle, Loyalty, and Respect.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this engaging episode, Reilly shares his rhino release dream. It’s time for Judy’s beloved duiker to return to the wild. And, a routine nyala capture takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, a warthog retrieval mission goes awry. Meet the matriarch of Imire, a wonderful elephant that has a unique story. It’s time to say farewell to the Imire family.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Jaguarland
programme.desc: Explore a 400 square mile region of the Pantanal where jaguars rule and life follows the seasonal rhythm of the water.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Rediscover the Tet Offensive: two months of battles that killed more than 15,000 American and Allied troops, and triggered anti-war protests across the U.S. Explore reports, images, and combat footage, much of which hasn’t been seen since 1968.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Experience a chronological recounting of the Apollo 13 near-disaster, one of NASA’s most devastating—and finest—moments. Witness the events of April 1970 as they unfolded through news footage, mission control audio, and NASA archives.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Examine the 2002 sniper attacks in Washington D.C. through police audio and video, as well as local and national news reports. The sniper’s three-week reign of terror triggered one of the most intense and complicated manhunts in American history.

programme.title: Air Warriors S11
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: See how the British bomber Lancaster flew out of the factory and into action, leading devastating attacks on Germany.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Mom is sick on a busy day at home, Tag offers to pick up the slack and take on her tasks for the day. Tag handles it at first, but when the responsibilities start to stack up, she realizes that being Mom is much harder than she thought. \ Tag and Scooch are excited to get to know Kit, who has organized a bunch of cat-ivities for the day. But when Kit realizes she accidentally scratched up Frank and Beans’s tree, she, Tag and Scooch find a way to make it up to them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Pooch’s, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dews' Glitter Guide, Willow comes to check on the Dews’ progress, they feel like they’re failing to impress her, until Lola gets locked out of the apartment during a game of Hide-and-Seek and Dews work together to get her back inside. / When the Dew Drops discover a time capsule in the park, they set out to find the mystery owner.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When Phoebe convinces the Tooth Fairy to visit before Marcus has actually lost his tooth, the Dew Drops do everything in their power to make sure the tooth is out before she arrives! / The Dews decide to hold a concert in the park for their animal friends, but can’t find the time to practice.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control"… or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup teams with an unexpected person in search for an antidote when Toothless is seemingly poisoned

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: The riders realize the Flyers are using the Deathsong to capture Singetails and plan a rescue mission to liberate them

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats’ everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The kids hatch a plan to take down Cleve and rescue Ms. Nowhere and Gary. Meanwhile, despite interference from Ziri, Cleve successfully begins to launch his satellites into space, which will allow him to use his weather machine to destroy Earth’s major cities and transform the Sahara into the only oasis. In order to stop the satellites, the team engages in an all-out battle against Cleve, Matsuo, and Rafaela. Just when it looks like our guys have the upperhand, Cleve shows them he has one last trick up his sleeve – a mech suit!

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Cleve has the team surrounded – is this the end? Suddenly, Cisco bursts in to save the day, along with all of the friends the team has made along the way in the Sahara. Working together, they manage to stop Cleve’s missiles and defeat Rafaela and Matsuo. But before they get a chance to celebrate, a giant fire tornado tears its way through the Sahara destroying everything in its path. Tony decides to make one last daring attempt in order to save the day.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: After an epic chase around the globe, the team finally catches Rafaela, making it Ms. Nowhere's 100th arrest - and the agency is throwing her a party! Meanwhile, Cisco's uncle Tuco, a famous luchador in Mexico, is visiting town promoting his next show. But the celebration comes to a halt when there's an explosion at the party and an attack by a mysterious group of criminals!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The kids hatch a plan to take down Cleve and rescue Ms. Nowhere and Gary. Meanwhile, despite interference from Ziri, Cleve successfully begins to launch his satellites into space, which will allow him to use his weather machine to destroy Earth’s major cities and transform the Sahara into the only oasis. In order to stop the satellites, the team engages in an all-out battle against Cleve, Matsuo, and Rafaela. Just when it looks like our guys have the upperhand, Cleve shows them he has one last trick up his sleeve – a mech suit!

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Cleve has the team surrounded – is this the end? Suddenly, Cisco bursts in to save the day, along with all of the friends the team has made along the way in the Sahara. Working together, they manage to stop Cleve’s missiles and defeat Rafaela and Matsuo. But before they get a chance to celebrate, a giant fire tornado tears its way through the Sahara destroying everything in its path. Tony decides to make one last daring attempt in order to save the day.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: After an epic chase around the globe, the team finally catches Rafaela, making it Ms. Nowhere's 100th arrest - and the agency is throwing her a party! Meanwhile, Cisco's uncle Tuco, a famous luchador in Mexico, is visiting town promoting his next show. But the celebration comes to a halt when there's an explosion at the party and an attack by a mysterious group of criminals!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy

programme.title: My Life Me

The popular, even-keeled Raffi turns out to be an impossible houseguest, quickly burning bridges with his podmates. In the end, not even Birch can stand the thought of another night having to house Pod 4's resident Mr. Perfect.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: When the janitor is the subject of ridicule in a widely spread cell phone picture, Principal Lemmon bans all electronic devices. Soon Cosmos High's extra controlling head honcho is faced with the decision whether or not life can go on without her beloved walkie-talkie. As technological abilities plunge, tempers escalate and a student revolt ensues.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Grounded from attending Dave's costume party, Birch sneaks out with the help of her podmates. A series of unforeseen circumstances sees the evening turn into an Odyssey for the podmates. And while it's not exactly what they planned, it's not all bad until they discover Birch has to end the evening by “breaking-in” to her own house.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Creative integrity gets a workout when Liam and Birch's Manga ends up in the pages of the local alternative magazine. Soon publisher pressure has Liam and Birch questioning their creative vision and how much they're willing to compromise. Of course, the two can't possibly be on the same side at the same time.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: Walking On Thin Ice
programme.desc: Eunsoo was an ordinary wife and mother who never broke a rule. But when her husband is given a death sentence by illness, her daughter walks away from school, and the family home is about to be taken, life leaves her cornered. programme.title: Glaciers
programme.desc: Glaciers possess a very special kind of “power.” They have acted as a catalyst for the birth and evolution of life on Earth. Glaciers are the source of human life and one of the most important partners in the Earth's climate system. However, due to global warming, glaciers are gradually disappearing. What, then, is happening to glaciers? This documentary explores what we must do to prevent the disappearance of glaciers, which may threaten the future of the Earth.

programme.title: Unkind Ladies
programme.desc: This drama features the women of three generations and people around them. Mari grows up as a good teacher of this generation where there is no true mentor. Hyeonsuk, who has been a troublemaker, realizes the love and support of her family. Kang Sunok regards herself as unlucky, but later on realizes how happy she has been. How can you hold up when your life gets tough? You will figure it out by holding up day by day, just like these women in the drama.

programme.title: Fong Sai-Yuk, Return of Heroes
programme.desc: After Fong Sai-Yuk’s adoptive father is murdered by traitors of the Red Flower Society, he vows to hunt them down and avenge his death. Driven by grief and loyalty, he rises against the conspirators in a ruthless fight for justice.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: A Sealed Book
programme.desc: The world descends into darkness when a sealed book, said to command the forces of the universe, is unearthed in an underground palace in the desert. As adventurers race to claim its power, the palace gates open, unleashing an unseen terror and heralding a catastrophe beyond imagination.

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm’s VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Fong Sai-Yuk, Return of Heroes

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Monkey Twins
programme.desc: After the tragic loss of his lover, Neua learns the Monkey Muay Thai skills and vows to avenge her death. His lover’s sister who practices Chinese Kung Fu, suspects Neua is responsible for her sister's death but later uncovers that she was killed by an organized crime ring. Together, they join forces to uphold justice and seek vengeance.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: Military veteran Wu and undercover cop Ming rescue hostages on an island near Bangkok. Just as the mission is completed and they prepare to leave, Wu discovers his daughter has also been captured. Determined to save her, he stays with Ming to fight the thugs and rescue her.

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law’s affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)
programme.desc: In South Carolina, Mike, and Jersey Jon fall hard for a grand old Southern home that's lost in time. Terry rescued the abandoned Southern belle and brought her back to life.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, the board game industry is aimed almost entirely at children, until a literal game changer comes along in Trivial Pursuit. Redefining the possibilities for adult fun.

programme.title: Ancient Empires
programme.desc: Alexander the Great of Macedon built one of the largest empires ever seen in just 13 years. Alexander not only has to contend with an increasingly powerful enemy, but also the loyalty of his men.

programme.title: Ride n' Seek: Borneo (S1)
programme.desc: After Jaime makes an unplanned stop to try Malaysian-style puffer fish, she finds herself behind schedule and is forced to seek shelter with the most savage headhunting tribe in Sarawak.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: This episode explores the strangest and most ghastly gigs ever. From night soil men cleaning excrement off the streets of Victorian London to professional mourners hired to weep at funerals!

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, the board game industry is aimed almost entirely at children, until a literal game changer comes along in Trivial Pursuit. Redefining the possibilities for adult fun.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: In 1983, underdog company Tonka sets out to bring a game-changing toy from Japan to America: the transformable robot. But they're soon confronted by industry giant, Hasbro, who has its own competing line.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)

programme.desc: From a deadly discovery hiding under a national park to a Nazi-era weapon sunk off the coast of New Jersey. You never know where a killer find is hiding or who may stumble upon it.

programme.title: The Death Coast
programme.desc: Jeff MacKinnon's team searches Scatarie Island for the Feversham's lost fortune. Battling brutal currents, they uncover artefacts that may lead to treasure.

programme.title: Abot Hanggang Sukdulan
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of the eldest daughter shattered the once happy Paredes household. They vowed to get justice for their daughter but changed their plan when Romano offered marriage after it was discovered that Agnes was pregnant.

programme.title: Miss Na Miss Kita (Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum 2)

programme.title: Pretty Boy Segovia
programme.desc: Pretty Boy Segovia

programme.title: Where 'D' Girls 'R'
programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae At Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: Tatlo Silang Tatay Ko
programme.desc: Siamese triplets Brando, Butch and Bronson (TVJ) are forced to take in the newly-orphaned Nitoy (Niño Muhlach). The journey from downright hostility to tolerance to acceptance and finally to filial love is a fun adventure guaranteed to amuse everybody.

programme.title: Manalo Matalo, Mahal Kita
programme.desc: Mikee played the girl selling lotto tickets. Cesar spent his last ten pesos on a ticket hoping to win the jackpot. The two had some fights, which eventually fade off as both fell in love with each other.

programme.title: Working Girls 2 (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Working Girls 2 is a funny yet insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a go of their chosen careers despite the prejudices encountered by the female gender. Viewers are sure to identify with any of the characters as the experiences of working women are well represented here.

programme.title: Hanggang Ngayo'y Ika'y Minamahal
programme.desc: She loves her husband despite his irresponsible ways.She continues to stand by him despite his flaws.

programme.title: Akyat Bahay Gang
programme.desc: Lito Lapid was working in a carnival. He learned to do many things to meet both ends. He was a good man but circumstances tried to direct him on the wrong path.

programme.title: Maging Sino Ka Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Together in a remote barrio, Sharon and Robin discovered love and the children found themselves a home. But first they must settle the matter of her money-hungry relatives and Robin must learn to accept Sharon's real self.

programme.title: Bikini Watch (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: It's a wild and funny tale of action and romance as they encountered a mischievous group of hunks who were out to destroy the beach.

programme.title: Kadenang Bulaklak
programme.desc: Three little girls were given up for adoption after their parents were killed in an accident. Vina, the oldest sister, was left behind with an aunt. She vowed that one day, she would find all her sisters and reunite her family.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 06
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for popping popcorn and polishing silverware. Plus, they'll uncover the best hacks for working out and using dental floss.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 8
programme.desc: When a container with a shady past lands on the auction block, Mo & Ty are ready to go all in. Will their big risk pay off? Or will their high hopes go up in smoke?

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 10
programme.desc: Sal, Q, Joe and Murr are partners in focus group presentations, supporting one another's insane ideas on living life to the fullest. And the loser tries to cure the public of a nasty habit - but gets people smoking mad.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 11
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Joe and Murr act as not-so-handy-men, helping strangers assemble furniture. The guys pair up for a panty drop at the mall, and Thanksgiving comes early for the loser when he's forced to talk turkey at a dating event.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 10
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: Smallville S1 12
programme.desc: When Clark rescues his classmate, Eric, from an electrical storm, they’re each struck by lightning -- and Clark’s superpowers are transferred to Eric.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: This week, Michael stuns shoppers at a thrift mart with a remarkably advanced antique that self-tailors clothes and a chalkboard that solves mathematical equations. And at a hardware store, a DIYer is left questioning the intelligence of beetles that follow blueprints and unscrew nuts and bolts. Plus, one woman is shocked and bewildered when Michael disappears and reappears before her very eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 6
programme.desc: Michael fishes for trouble in a toy store with pop-up books that contain live animals and, at a health food store, he makes a woman's day by showing her how to milk almonds. Later, a mummy causes an employee to question ancient curses.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 2
programme.desc: Leo hires Mandy as a consultant to the President.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 10
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 06
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for popping popcorn and polishing silverware. Plus, they'll uncover the best hacks for working out and using dental floss.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 8
programme.desc: When a container with a shady past lands on the auction block, Mo & Ty are ready to go all in. Will their big risk pay off? Or will their high hopes go up in smoke?

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 12
programme.desc: It's hats off for Murr, Sal, Q and Joe when they work as cap salesmen. Then, the guys head to Joey Fatone's hot dog joint to serve confused customers. And the loser performs a stand-up comedy routine but barely gets out alive.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 15
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q put the nasty in "namaste" when they lead guided meditations that leave their victims with a lot to think about. And the big loser gets boxed in with the very first 24-hour punishment.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 13
programme.desc: Sean holds a one of a kind auction in Malibu, at the Rolls Royce of storage facilities. T Money needs a robot -- but does that mean he'll get it? Jesse draws on his pinball skills to outwit his competitors, while Brandon and Lori take one of the biggest gambles of their career. Will it pay off with an unbelievable score, or will they be crying all the way to the bank?

programme.title: Smallville S1 13
programme.desc: Clark and Lex are mystified when the Luthor mansion is robbed by burglars who seem to have the ability to walk through walls.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 7
programme.desc: Michael gets spooky at an antique store with a vintage voodoo doll and, at a costume store, a Dorothy outfit comes complete with a little dog too. Then, at an arcade, the atmosphere turns from fun to freaky for an employee when Michael gets "zapped" from one game to the next.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 8
programme.desc: Filling in as a karate instructor, Michael disrupts the Zen of his student with skills that literally lift him off the ground, and at a toy store, Michael's frog necklace is so fashionably realistic that it has one little girl begging for a new pet. Then at a military outfitting store, Michael and an employee put together a clothing display that puts the "man" in mannequin.

programme.title: From Waterfalls to Outer Space!
programme.desc: Gecko's on epic adventures, from saving Grandma at a waterfall to launching a spaceship to the moon!

programme.title: A Cheesy Mission, Tricked & Fun!
programme.desc: Rob & the crew are on a mission! They travel to the Cheese Planet, the Magic Planet & the Imagination Planet!

programme.title: Team Power, A Cosmic Day & Bowling
programme.desc: Rob & the crew have an exciting day! They collect power elements & celebrate Cosmic Day with their friends!

programme.title: Baby John is Growing Up!
programme.desc: Baby John is growing up! He learns that being little is awesome, shows his feelings & finds his lost pacifier!

programme.title: Baby John is a Great Big Brother!
programme.desc: Baby John is a great big brother! He learns to share, be kind & wants to be just like his brother Jack!

programme.title: Causing Chaos All Over Town!
programme.desc: Arpo & Daniel cause chaos all over town! They have a wild supermarket chase & a messy picnic!

programme.title: Squirrel Trouble & Other Wacky Problems!
programme.desc: Arpo faces squirrel trouble & other wacky problems, like a ghost in the house & a malfunctioning music mode!

programme.title: Little Problems, Big Adventures!
programme.desc: Mila & Morphle turn little problems into big adventures! They rescue a dog & help Daddy after a hairy mishap!

programme.title: Taking on the Baddest Baddies in Town!
programme.desc: Mila & Morphle take on the baddest baddies! They stop robot versions of themselves & an evil Orphle!

programme.title: Baby John's Big World Adventure!
programme.desc: Baby John's on a big world adventure! He explores a reptile zoo, visits an insect park & goes to space camp!

programme.title: What Makes Our Family So Special!
programme.desc: What makes our family so special? Baby John plays with grandpa & learns why his big sister Jill is great!

programme.title: Blocks, Dancing, Football & Storytime!
programme.desc: The Minibods learn to play together! Jeff & Bubbles share blocks & Fuse learns to be a team player!

programme.title: My Hero, A Story, A Teddy & Greens!
programme.desc: The Minibods learn big lessons! Bubbles becomes Lulu's hero & Fuse is encouraged to eat his healthy greens!

programme.title: At Home with Cody and His Family!
programme.desc: It's a day at home with Cody's family! He helps his dad at the bakery & learns about African instruments!

programme.title: JJ's Splashin' Jungle Jams!
programme.desc: JJ's having a splashin' dance party! He plays freeze dance at the beach & learns his ABCs under the sea!

programme.title: A Day with Nina's Family
programme.desc: Spend a day with Nina's family! She learns about planes from her Dad & makes breakfast with her Abuelita!

programme.title: Creative Farm Adventures!
programme.desc: It's a creative farm adventure! Ella brings school to the barn, makes delicious jam & does some stargazing!

programme.title: Big Surprises on the Farm!
programme.desc: There are big surprises on the farm! Ella & Bee find a mysterious tortoise egg & meet new tiger twin friends!

programme.title: The Biggest, Craziest Disasters!
programme.desc: The crew faces the biggest disasters! They escape an avalanche & rescue a friend trapped down a hole!

programme.title: Races, Games & Helping Friends!
programme.desc: It's a day of competitions & helping friends! The crew races in an obstacle course & rescues a cute kitten!

programme.title: The Ultimate Teamwork & Rescue Special!
programme.desc: It's a teamwork & rescue special! Kii & Yii save Princess Cat from a well & from her out-of-control plane!

programme.title: When Everything Goes Hilariously Wrong!
programme.desc: Everything goes hilariously wrong! Robot gets stuck in jelly & Princess Cat's castle fills with bubbles!

programme.title: A Super Fun Underwater Sing-Along!
programme.desc: It's an underwater sing-along! Sing about five little sharks jumping on the bed & an underwater spider!

programme.title: Underwater Learning Adventures!
programme.desc: It's an underwater learning adventure! The Sharksons sing the ABCs, learn colors & brush their shark teeth!

programme.title: Fun Adventures & Sleepy Songs!
programme.desc: It's a day of fun adventures & sleepy songs! Twinkle learns animal sounds & sings a lullaby with Mr. Moon!

programme.title: JJ Learns to Take Care of Himself!
programme.desc: JJ learns to take care of himself! He learns to brush his teeth, gets ready for school & visits the dentist!

programme.title: Messy Mayhem in the Clubhouse!
programme.desc: It's messy mayhem in the clubhouse! A slime volcano erupts & a magic mirror makes lots of colorful Bobas!

programme.title: At Home with Cody and His Family!
programme.desc: It's a day at home with Cody's family! He helps his dad at the bakery & learns about African instruments!

programme.title: The Ultimate Outdoor Play Day!

programme.title: A Calming Night with Twinkle!

programme.title: Let's Get Curious & Creative!
programme.desc: Let's get curious & creative! The mysterious Curiosity Crew appears & Blippi learns to mix colors with them!

programme.title: How Awesome Things Work!

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless

You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Red Snow
programme.desc: Olivia, an outstanding vampire romance novelist, longs to encounter a real vampire. Her wish comes true when Luke turns up at her remote snowbound cabin seeking for help. However, her dream transforms into a chilling nightmare on Christmas Eve when Luke's vampire companions track him down...

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Jealousy
programme.desc: Model Min is admitted to a hospital, but mysteriously falls to her death at night. Rumour has it that the hospital is haunted. Subsequently, Min's photographer begins receiving eerie phone calls, the writer loses consciousness in a bizarre car accident, and her friend mysteriously disappears…

programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: In the shadow of the Rockies, Carolyn Jansen, 43, is found dead, stuffed into a duct-taped container. Detectives have two suspects but no clear way to tell who is the killer.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: In 1998, a fire in Sandi Nieves' home that started under suspicious circumstances led to her conviction for arson, the murders of her four daughters, and the attempted murder of her son David.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: African-American women in the Mt Pleasant neighbourhood of Cleveland were vanishing. Their families cried for help, but no one knew what was happening. No one except Anthony Sowell.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After the gruesome murder of an aspiring actor in Georgia, police quickly run out of leads. But a new digital forensic tool breathes new life into the investigation.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: Curtis Reeves stands accused of murdering Chad Oulson over popcorn at a matinee movie. The defence claims he acted in self-defence—that Oulson was the aggressor.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: Nia Wilson and her two sisters decided to take public transportation back home. But just minutes after texting their father, the sisters were brutally targeted at a train station.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: When Toni meets Harold at a medical convention, they click and soon marry. But when money starts going missing from Toni's account, suspicion falls on Harold.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: May 13, 2020, Reno, Nevada. Officers from the Reno Police Department are dispatched to the La Quinta Inn after several motel guests report hearing gunshots in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: In 2006, Ken Juedes was found dead by his wife, Cindy Shulz-Juedes. For 13 years the case went cold until investigators linked her to the murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When a Christian ranch hand, Dan Lavigne, 52, is shot dead on his porch in Montana, 2002, deputies find no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: After a man and a woman are found shot, investigators struggle to find clues to catch the killer until a deputy locates the victim's car filled with guns, silencers, and a mysterious man behind the wheel.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: When an otherwise healthy woman is admitted to the hospital with sudden organ failure, an anonymous tip leads authorities to investigate a pattern of deaths in her family and a shocking prime suspect.

programme.title: Hoarders (S15)
programme.desc: After learning his partner was stealing, enduring heart surgery, and facing other hardships, Bob withdrew into his 7,000-sq-ft Victorian mansion, filling it with antiques.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: An undercover NYPD officer and an ATF special agent learn firsthand not to trust a suspect's demeanour, regardless of how amicable it may appear.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: When one of Redlands, California's newest residents goes missing, the distraught community bands together to help find her.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A forensic DNA expert, Dr Maria Corazon de Ungria helps prove a man's innocence and solves a victim's identity using bones.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S2)
programme.desc: Malaysia's top forensic entomologist Dr Nazni Wasi Ahmad shows how insects on a corpse can provide useful clues on the death.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Charming and smart, Henry tried to hide his dark side, fuelled by years of abuse and twisted fantasies, until his first murder. Then, bad Henry took over.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A longstanding feud comes to a head when two neighbours confront each other with guns; a school bus driver goes on a dangerous high-speed chase to outrun an irate parent who attacks her bus with a hammer.

programme.desc: A man risks his life to save his wife during a home invasion; two convenience store workers defend their workplace; a hairdresser is put in an unpredictable situation; and more.

programme.desc: Aralin ang pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, pagbabasa ng teksto, at kung ano ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Understand more about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area through square-tile units, alongside pictographs with and without scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Identify pronouns and prepositions, and how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Pahalagahan ang kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento, at kung paano magsulat ng kuwento at magbigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Know how to convert time, what are the linear, mass and capacity measures, the area of square and rectangle, bar graphs, and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Learn more about adjectives, adverbs, maps, graphs, how to read words, and how to restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang mga gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Find out more about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. Discover the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magbigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto, kung paano wastong magbaybay ng mga salita at maglarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: Learn more about area, volume, temperature, line graphs, and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: Analyze visual and multimedia elements and learn how to write paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag-usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: Know how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment, weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon, the beliefs and practices associated with it, and the constellations with the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Suriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito, paano magpahayag ng sariling paniniwala, at kung ano ang malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: We are in the southernmost region of the Maurienne for a programme that celebrates winter and the snow that comes with it. Snow that some turn into veritable works of art!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: Giannina Meienhofer takes us on a tour of her big house in Lenggenwil, filled with... dolls! Zurich-based Andreas Gassmann has transformed a lorry into a motor home measuring thirteen metres long and four metres high.

programme.title: Curieux Begin
programme.desc: Second Italian stop in Veneto to enjoy Prosecco, exceptional cheeses, and a delicate risotto. The journey ends with a Spritz and cicchetti on Venice's bridges.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: With the Art Deco movement now over a century old we look back at the exhibition ''Art Deco France/North America'' at the Cite de l'Architecture et du Patrimoine. The story of woad. All the expertise of the Joseph Duclos Manufacture Royale recounted by Ramesh Nair. Wearing clothes with wide shoulders.

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Away for quite some time, Ulysses joins the therapy via video call. Penelope longs for him and tries to make him understand that long-distance love isn't easy.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Curieux Begin
programme.desc: Second Italian stop in Veneto to enjoy Prosecco, exceptional cheeses, and a delicate risotto. The journey ends with a Spritz and cicchetti on Venice's bridges.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: Giannina Meienhofer takes us on a tour of her big house in Lenggenwil, filled with... dolls! Zurich-based Andreas Gassmann has transformed a lorry into a motor home measuring thirteen metres long and four metres high.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: We are in the southernmost region of the Maurienne for a programme that celebrates winter and the snow that comes with it. Snow that some turn into veritable works of art!

programme.title: Bestioles & Cie
programme.desc: Whether it's a lake, tree or field, there are always a host of mini-creatures. Often feared, because unknown, we discover just how fascinating they are as we take an immersive visit into their world. Often, and wrongly, underestimated, they play an essential role in the natural cycle of life.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: La Menace
programme.desc: With his mistress, Dominique, Henry runs a transport company which she owns. In love with the beautiful Julie, Henry is about to leave her. Furious, Dominique violently confronts her rival then commits suicide. The police conclude that it's murder. Julie, accused by everyone, is arrested...
November 2030. It's 48°C in the classroom. Impossible to do any teaching.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The body of Helene Bertillon, director of a water sports base, is found in the Saint-Paul pond nature reserve. As the investigation is conducted jointly by the police and the gendarmerie, tensions rise quickly.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Another body is discovered and all eyes turn to the victim's phone, which may contain valuable clues.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: De Miel Et De Sang
programme.desc: Carel has returned to his native Provence. With his former high school friend, today head of the local police, he investigates the death of a man killed by being stung by dozens of bees. Gradually they uncover a horrific case from the past, one that had shaken the entire village.

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: On the outskirts of Fontainebleau, the Musee des Peintres de Barbizon traces the history of Impressionism. A self-taught chef turned Michelin-starred chef, Guy Martin looks back on his gastronomic career at the Grand Vefour. Time travel with Chemena Kamali, at the helm of Chloe. The art of straw marquetry with Stephanie Trolez.

Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
